Name: RSI Aurora LN
Description:
Manufacturer: RSI
Focus: Light Fighter

With a more robust shield generator and a pair of additional weapon hard points, the Legionnaire is a dedicated combat fighter, built to handle any obstacle the universe can throw at you.
